title: HR Smart Tools Suite
summary: JD Creation: Generate complete JDs in the Solutions+ format with just three fields. CV Matching: Compare up to 50 candidates against any JD â€” get top 3 instantly. Candidate Placement: Identify the 3 most suitable departments for referrals.
content:
The HR Smart Tools Suite transforms talent management with three powerful AI-driven capabilities:

**JD Creation**: Generate comprehensive job descriptions in Solutions+ format by providing just three fields: role title, department, and key responsibilities. The AI automatically adds required competencies, qualifications, and organizational standards.

**CV Matching**: Upload up to 50 candidate CVs and instantly compare them against any job description. The system analyzes skills, experience, and cultural fit to identify the top 3 candidates, complete with detailed scoring and justification.

**Candidate Placement**: For internal referrals or transfers, the AI analyzes candidate profiles and identifies the 3 most suitable departments based on skills alignment, career trajectory, and organizational needs.

title: HR Data Access for BU Heads
summary: Query real-time employee performance, RRFs, and promotion data directly via chat.
content:
Business Unit Heads now have unprecedented access to HR insights through our conversational AI interface. Query real-time data on employee performance metrics, Requisition for Recruitment (RRF) status, promotion pipelines, and team analytics â€” all through natural language.

The system maintains strict role-based access controls, ensuring that managers only see data relevant to their teams. Insights are presented with visual dashboards and actionable recommendations, enabling data-driven decision-making without navigating complex HR systems.
